title: N172 Mickey Welch for Trade or Sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: N172 Mickey Welch for Trade or Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Good looking card of the HOFer. Was skinned and has been rebacked to stabilize. This card is as nice as the SGC 20/FAIR one with back damage that sold on ebay the other day (item #190172854564) for over $1000.

Would prefer to get something off my want list in trade, but I am open to other reasonable offers.

kkkkandp@aol.com

N172 Old Judge Players – Charlie Bastian, Thomas Burns, Mike Griffin (arms folded or batting), Frank Hankinson, John Harkins, William Hoover, Michael Hughes, John Kelly, Harry Lyons, Kid Madden (arms folded, bat next to rock), Jim McGarr (with umpire), Charlie Reipschlager, Taylor Shaffer, Leon Viau, James White, Ed Williamson & mascot
N172 Old Judge Teams - Hartford, Jersey City, Lowell, Mansfield, Wilkes-Barre
